content.webTitle: Manchester City v Liverpool: match preview

fields.headline: Manchester City v Liverpool: match preview
fields.bodyText: This is the showdown of the season so far, between the reigning champions and those of the two preceding campaigns. Manchester City are starting to hit form, with Ferran Torres appearing one of the buys of the summer. Liverpool, though, have had the measure of City in recent seasons and so will arrive in east Manchester as a decent shot to record what could prove a materially significant win. Jamie Jackson Sunday 4.30pm Sky Sports Premier League Venue Etihad Stadium Last season Manchester City 4 Liverpool 0 Odds H Evens A 5-2 D 3-1 Referee Craig Pawson This season G4 Y15 R0 3.5 cards/game MANCHESTER CITY Subs from Steffen, Carson, García, Doyle, Harwood-Bellis, Delap, Palmer, Zinchenko, Gündogan, Stones, Bernabe, Silva, Aké, Jesus Doubtful None Injured Fernandinho (leg, 21 Nov), Mendy (knee, 21 Nov), Agüero (hamstring, 21 Nov) Suspended None Discipline Y9 R0 Form WLDWDW Leading scorers Foden, Sterling 2 LIVERPOOL Subs from Adrián, Kelleher, Tsimikas, R Williams, N Williams, Phillips, Koumetio, Keïta, Milner, Shaqiri, Firmino, Minamino, Origi Doubtful None Injured Thiago (knee, 21 Nov), Fabinho (hamstring, 21 Nov), Oxlade-Chamberlain (knee, Dec), Van Dijk (knee, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y6 R0 Form WWLDWW Leading scorer Salah 7
